original_text: Shelomoth and his relatives had authority for all the holy things that people had offered as gifts to God. King David, the leaders of clans and army officers had given those things to God.
korean_text: 이 슬로못과 그의 형제는 성물의 모든 곳간을 맡았으니 곧 다윗 왕과 가문의 우두머리와 천부장과 백부장과 군대의 모든 지휘관이 구별하여 드린 성물이라

sentences.original_text: Shelomoth and his relatives had authority
that people had offered as gifts to God
King David, the leaders of clans and army officers
had given those things to God
